description: Roger was put into foster care when he was eleven years old and spent four years in and out of […]
contentencoded: Roger was put into foster care when he was eleven years old and spent four years in and out of foster homes, group homes and relatives’ homes. Most teens in foster care never get adopted. Still, Roger never gave up faith that he would find a family.
